text: mariyu vari vaddaku edaina sucana vaccinappudu varu: "Allah yokka sandesaharulaku ivvabadinatlu, maku kuda (divyajnanam) ivvabadananta varaku memu visvasincamu." Ani antaru. Tana sandesanni evaripai avatarimpajeyalo allah ku baga telusu. Tvaralone aparadhulu allah daggara avamanimpabadagalaru. Mariyu vari kutrala phalitanga variki tivramaina siksa vidhincabadagaladu
